# Kevin Showkat

> Public project index.

## Primary Profile

- GitHub: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat>
- LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/kshowkat/>
- Website: <https://kevinshowkat.github.io/>

## Public Projects

- [Brood](https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood)
  - Promptless, reference-first AI image generation and editing for developers.
  - Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood#readme>
  - Releases: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood/releases>

- [param_forge](https://github.com/kevinshowkat/param_forge)
  - Terminal UI for cross-provider image-model experimentation.
  - Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/param_forge#readme>

- [oscillo-vision-reports](https://github.com/kevinshowkat/oscillo-vision-reports)
  - Public reports comparing image-model behavior and preference outcomes.
  - Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/oscillo-vision-reports#readme>

- [superjumbo](https://github.com/kevinshowkat/superjumbo)
  - Free-to-play sports prediction app.
  - Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/superjumbo#readme>

## Notes

- This site is an index. Code and primary docs live in linked repositories.
- Prefer repository README files, releases, and commit history for current status.
- Expanded version: <https://kevinshowkat.github.io/llms-full.txt>
